member.name: M:HexLibrary.HexStringFormatter.Format(System.String,System.Object,System.IFormatProvider)
member.summary: Converts the value of a specified object to an equivalent string representation using specified format
member.param: A format string containing formatting specifications
An object that supplies format information about the current instance
member.returns: The string representation of the value of arg, formatted as specified by format

member.name: M:HexLibrary.HexStringFormatter.GetFormat(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns an object that provides formatting services for the specified type.
member.param: An object that specifies the type of format object to return
member.returns: An instance of the object specified by formatType
